sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing Wanderlust, you agree to these Terms. If you disagree, please refrain from using our platform.

sections.title: Guide Responsibilities
sections.content: Guides must provide accurate information and maintain professional conduct. Wanderlust reserves the right to remove guides who violate our community standards.

sections.title: User Content
sections.content: Reviews and photos must be authentic. Fake content will be removed and may result in account suspension.

sections.title: Payments & Commissions
sections.content: Wanderlust charges an 8% commission on completed bookings. This fee supports platform maintenance and guide verification services.

sections.title: Data Collection
sections.content: We collect only necessary information: name, email, and booking details. Payment processing is handled securely by Stripe.

sections.title: Data Usage
sections.content: Your data helps personalize your experience and improve our services. We never sell your information to third parties.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content: We use essential cookies for functionality. You can disable non-essential cookies in your browser settings.

sections.title: User Rights
sections.content: You may request account deletion at any time by contacting privacy@wanderlust.bi. Data will be anonymized within 30 days.
